ModMetaData.name: [Luna]压缩储存冰箱CompressedRimfridge

ModMetaData.description: 添加了能够储存更多食物的大容量储存冰箱\n\nAdded a large storage refrigerator that can store more food [h1]Links|连结[/h1][list] [*] [url=https://github.com/LunaGlaze/Rimworld_LunaLittleMods] Github [/url] [*] [url=https://patreon.com/shiqiluna] Patreon [/url](I probably don't use it that often) [*] [url=https://afdian.com/a/shiqiluna] 爱发电 [/url](Available to Chinese users) [/list] [img]https://www.img520.com/n7NlQ5.jpg[/img]
